name: Calii
headline: Full-stack grocery delivery in LatAm
description:
Calii is building the future of grocery shopping in LatAm by delivering ultra-fresh produce and thousands of grocery items in less than two hours– with savings and less waste!

Founded by Stanford engineers, Calii is taking a full-stack, tech-driven approach connecting directly with producers and brands, automating the food supply chain end-to-end, and delivering to users’ doorsteps via a network of micro-fulfillment centers. By cutting middlemen and inefficiencies in the food supply chain, users get ultra-fresh groceries with savings, meanwhile helping the environment by reducing waste by up to 3X.

Even though COVID-19 increased the use of grocery delivery apps, grocery shopping remains largely offline (~95%) and represents a multi-trillion dollar opportunity. Calii is already cracking the $1T groceries market in its path to become the next-gen Amazon in LatAm.

founders.name: Maurizio Caló Caligaris, Founder
founders.description:
Now: co-founder and CTO @ Calii.

Background: early engineer @ fintech unicorn Addepar, deep learning researcher @ Stanford AI Lab under Andrew Ng, instructor and TA @ Stanford CS department, math olympic medalist.

raw_markdown='[![Calii Logo Calii Color](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/calii_tq_logo.png)](https://calii.com/<#>) [Descargar app](https://calii.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.calii>)
#### Ahorra 40% en tu súper semanal
Tus frutas y verduras directo de productores. ¡Más fresco, más ahorros! Miles de artículos adicionales a precios inigualables. Envíos en menos de 2 horas y gratis en compras mayores a $800.
[![](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/google_play_download.png)](https://calii.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.calii>) [![](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/app_store_download.png)](https://calii.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/mx/app/calii/id1436119504>)
![Calii app preview](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/hero_image.png)
[arrow_downward](https://calii.com/<#rest>)
×
[![Calii app preview](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/farmers_video_preview_image.jpg)](https://calii.com/<https:/vimeo.com/577784334>)
#### Directo de productores. ¡Más fresco, más ahorros!
Al conectarnos directo con productores, recibes tus frutas y verduras más frescas con increíbles ahorros.
![Calii envío gratis a domicilio](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/van.png)
#### Entregas a domicilio en menos de 2 horas y sin costo
Recibe tus pedidos en la puerta de tu casa el mismo día y ¡gratis en pedidos mayores a $700!
![Calii envío gratis a domicilio](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/van.png)
![Calii promos y regalos de locura](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/gifts_and_promos.png)
#### Regalos y promos de locura cada semana
Descubre regalitos y promos inigualables en tus productos favoritos.
![Calii categorías](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/Categorias.png)
#### Miles de artículos del súper a precios inigualables
Además de tus frutas y verduras, completa tu súper semanal con los mejores artículos en carnes, lácteos, graneles, botanas, artículos del hogar y ¡mucho más!
![Calii categorías](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/Categorias.png)
![Caliidad garantizada](https://calii.s3.amazonaws.com/landing/quality_guarantee.png)
#### CALIIdad y frescura garantizada
¿No te gustó algún producto? Recibe un reemplazo o reembolso en menos de 2 horas. ¡Facilísimo desde la app!
#### La app #1 del súper a domicilio en México
Miles de pedidos al día. ¡Muchísimos clientes felices!

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Calii**

Calii is an ambitious and innovative grocery delivery startup that aims to transform how Latin America shops for groceries. Founded in 2019 by a group of Stanford engineers, Calii leverages a full-stack, tech-driven approach to create a seamless connection between consumers and food producers, enabling delivery of ultra-fresh produce and thousands of grocery items in under two hours—at significant savings and with less waste. This positioning not only addresses consumer needs but also mitigates environmental impacts by reducing food waste by up to three times.

### Mission

Calii's mission is clear: provide full-stack grocery delivery solutions tailored for the Latin American market. By automating the food supply chain end-to-end and engaging directly with producers, Calii eliminates middlemen and inefficiencies that plague traditional grocery shopping, making it both faster and more economical for consumers.

### Market Opportunity

Despite a rise in the use of grocery delivery apps post-COVID-19, a staggering 95% of grocery shopping is still done offline in the region, representing a multi-trillion dollar opportunity. With a keen focus on this market, Calii is positioned to make significant inroads into the $1 trillion grocery sector, aspiring to be the next-gen Amazon of Latin America.

### Operations and Team

Headquartered in Monterrey, Mexico, Calii employs a capable team of about 750 employees. The company is part of the Y Combinator Batch S18 and receives mentorship from Group Partner Dalton Caldwell, signifying its potential for growth and innovation.

### Key Features

- **Fast Delivery**: Customers can receive their groceries at home within two hours, with free shipping on orders over $800 MXN.
- **Fresh Produce**: Direct sourcing from farmers ensures that customers enjoy fresher fruits and vegetables with notable savings.
- **Diverse Selection**: Beyond fresh produce, Calii offers a wide range of grocery items, including meats, dairy, household essentials, and more—often at competitive prices.
- **Customer Satisfaction**: The app has garnered an impressive rating of 4.8/5, reflecting a solid base of happy customers who appreciate the app's ease of use and the quality of fresh products.

### Social and Environmental Impact

By cutting down on the middlemen and unnecessary complexities in the food supply chain, Calii not only presents savings to its customers but also fosters a more sustainable shopping experience by minimizing food waste.

### Conclusion

In a world where convenience and sustainability often seem at odds, Calii is remarkably positioned to bridge that gap in the grocery sector across Latin America. With its strong tech foundation, efficient logistics, and thoughtful approach to fresh grocery delivery, Calii is paving the way for the future of grocery shopping.

For more details, visit [Calii's website](https://calii.com) or check out their app on [Google Play](https://calii.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.calii>) and [App Store](https://calii.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/mx/app/calii/id1436119504>).
